rows.label: qev025103_MSG0001
rows.name:
For the love of sauce! Another grenade pizza?!
I'm telling you people, I can only make 'em so fast!
Gimme a minute already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0002
rows.name:
But no, customers keep flooding in and asking where
their order is and I don't know! Okay?
I DON'T FRIGGIN' KNOW![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0010
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0011
rows.name: Question Powell about Duduma.

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0020
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0021
rows.name: Try to calm Powell down before asking questions.

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0003
rows.name: What? That little twerp Ackwar sent you to ME?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0004
rows.name: Dammit, I ain't got time for this right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0005
rows.name:
This joint's about 10 minutes from being overrun by a
buncha friggin' pizza-crazed Ma-non![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0006
rows.name: Calm? Calm?! HOW CAN I BE FRIGGIN' CALM?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0007
rows.name:
This joint's about 10 minutes from being overrun by a
buncha friggin' pizza-crazed Ma-non![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0008
rows.name:
And why are you even here, eh? What's your deal?
...Ackwar sent you? Well, I ain't got time for this
right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0009
rows.name:
That is, unless you wanna go out and deliver this
friggin' pizza for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0010
rows.name:
Do that and I'll tell you whatever you want.
Okay, buddy? Now scram![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to deliver the pizza.

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Powell you're not a delivery monkey.

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0011
rows.name: Man, you are a friggin' godsend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0012
rows.name:
Then here—order up! One grenade pizza for a
Ma-non named Mikkal. Should be on that huge
friggin' ship of theirs somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0013
rows.name:
Oh, and Mikkal's a regular, so try to be friggin' polite.
Now, MOVE OUT! Deploy that pizza! Hup hup hup![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Yeah? Well I ain't got time for loiterers, so make like
an egg and beat it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0017
rows.name:
You've got your orders, soldier! Your target's Mikkal,
aboard the Ma-non ship. Hurry while it's still hot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'll be here, staving off the hungry mob with as many
friggin' grenade pizzas as I can bake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0019
rows.name:
Phew, finally I can catch my breath...
Looks like you finished up, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0020
rows.name:
I tell ya, no beast on Mira's nastier than a hungry
Ma-non. ...So how bad was it, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0050
rows.name: Terrible

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0051
rows.name: Ramble on to Powell about your delivery woes.

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0060
rows.name: Fine

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0061
rows.name: Admit the job was easier than you expected.

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0021
rows.name: Appreciate you taking that friggin' bullet for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0022
rows.name:
It's been like this ever since I lost the missus.
I'm two hands short for everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0023
rows.name:
Days like these, it's real apparent just how important
she was. ...Er, to the shop, y'know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0024
rows.name: You sound like my wife.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0025
rows.name:
She used to breeze through even the busiest days with
a wink and a friggin' smile...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0026
rows.name: Heh... Good times. I miss that smile.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0027
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0028
rows.name:
...Gah, sorry! Gotta buck up. Got tomorrow's pizza
and the day after to be worrying about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0029
rows.name: So what was it you wanted to know about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0030
rows.name: Fire away. You helped me out, now it's my turn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0070
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0071
rows.name:
Ask Powell whether he noticed anything
strange about Duduma lately.

rows.label: qev025103_JNK0080
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025103_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask what Duduma was like.

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0031
rows.name:
Strange? No, not that I remember. Duduma comes in,
orders the usual, and wolfs it down same as all of 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0032
rows.name: Duduma... Ma-non girl? Yeah, she's a regular.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0033
rows.name:
Eats a lot of pizza, I can tell you that much.
Probably puts away 10 friggin' pies a week.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0034
rows.name:
Though now you mention it, I haven't had any orders
from her in a while. Did something happen?
What's all this about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0035
rows.name: ...What?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0036
rows.name:
You serious? That cheery pizza nut went and jumped
off a friggin' building? There ain't no way that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0037
rows.name:
No, wait. She got in a fight right here in my shop.
Some BLADE named Gerome—think they bumped
shoulders or something stupid like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0038
rows.name:
She seemed real down after that, but...suicide?
That's hard to swallow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0039
rows.name: Still, I guess it might be worth looking into.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0040
rows.name:
That Gerome fella seemed to be badgering Duduma
regularly ever since their little...misunderstanding.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025103_MSG0041
rows.name: Maybe look him up, if you're digging up info.[ST:wait ]
